snippet: Universal has quietly put together a 2015 slate that brings an echo of the studio’s 1980s glory days, one that analysts say could make Universal the year’s No. 1 studio, at least by ticket sales.
abstract: Universal Pictures has without fanfare assembled 2015 schedule of films that could be reminiscent of its heyday in 1980s, including potential new blockbuster Fifty Shades of Grey; ticket sales could make Universal top studio for the year.
lead_paragraph: Universal has quietly put together a 2015 slate that brings an echo of the studio’s 1980s glory days, one that analysts say could make Universal the year’s No. 1 studio, at least by ticket sales.

headline.main: Universal Pictures Regains a Bit of Its Old Sheen
headline.print_headline: Universal Pictures Regains a Bit of Its Old Sheen
